stories.title: Argentina's government uses Grafana for their Covid cases public dashboard

stories.text:
I have been playing around trying to make a project (software + hardware) simulating a network of kiosks that I think is ready for a commercial trial. I have found a few potential early adopters.

Considering that I use Raspberry Pi 4 for every device. What considerations should I take into account before going beyond?
stories.title: Ask HN: What should I consider before selling Raspberry Pi based project?

stories.text: I'm looking for something like Personal Capital or Mint but would prefer open source, offline first version instead. Curious what the HN crowd uses
